   21: %%
   22: -module(gen_server_behaviour_simple_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -define(GEN_SERVER, gen_server_behaviour_simple).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   28: 
   29: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   30: 
   31: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   32: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   33: -export([start/1, start_event_timeout/1, start_event_timeout_zero/1,
   34: 	 crash/1, loop_start_fail/1, call/1, send_request/1,
   35:          send_request_receive_reqid_collection/1,
   36:          send_request_wait_reqid_collection/1,
   37:          send_request_check_reqid_collection/1,
   38:          cast/1, cast_fast/1, continue/1, info/1, abcast/1,
   39: 	 handle_event_timeout/1,
   40:          handle_event_timeout_infinity/1,
   41:          handle_event_timeout_zero/1,
   42: 	 handle_event_timeout_plain/1,
   43:          multicall/1, multicall_down/1, multicall_remote/1,
   44:          multicall_remote_old1/1, multicall_remote_old2/1,
   45:          multicall_recv_opt_success/1,
   46:          multicall_recv_opt_timeout/1,
   47:          multicall_recv_opt_noconnection/1,
   48: 	 call_remote1/1, call_remote2/1, call_remote3/1, calling_self/1,
   49: 	 call_remote_n1/1, call_remote_n2/1, call_remote_n3/1, spec_init/1,
   50: 	 spec_init_local_registered_parent/1, 
   51: 	 spec_init_global_registered_parent/1,
   52: 	 otp_5854/1, hibernate/1, auto_hibernate/1, otp_7669/1, call_format_status/1,
   53: 	 error_format_status/1, terminate_crash_format/1, crash_in_format_status/1,
   54:          throw_in_format_status/1, format_all_status/1,
   55: 	 get_state/1, replace_state/1, call_with_huge_message_queue/1,
   56: 	 undef_handle_call/1, undef_handle_cast/1, undef_handle_info/1,
   57: 	 undef_init/1, undef_code_change/1, undef_terminate1/1,
   58: 	 undef_terminate2/1, undef_in_terminate/1, undef_in_handle_info/1,
   59: 	 undef_handle_continue/1,
   60: 
   61:          format_log_1/1, format_log_2/1, format_log_with_process_label/1,
   62:          reply_by_alias_with_payload/1
   63: 	]).
   64: 
   65: -export([stop1/1, stop2/1, stop3/1, stop4/1, stop5/1, stop6/1, stop7/1,
   66: 	 stop8/1, stop9/1, stop10/1]).
   67: 
   68: %% spawn export
   69: -export([spec_init_local/2, spec_init_global/2, spec_init_via/2,
   70: 	 spec_init_default_timeout/2, spec_init_global_default_timeout/2,
   71:          spec_init_anonymous/1,
   72: 	 spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout/1,
   73: 	 spec_init_not_proc_lib/1,
   74: 	 spec_init_action/2,
   75: 	 cast_fast_messup/0]).
   76: 
   77: %% Internal test specific exports
   78: -export([multicall_srv_ctrlr/2, multicall_suspender/2]).
   79: 
   80: %% The gen_server behaviour
   81: -export([init/1, handle_call/3, handle_cast/2, handle_continue/2,
   82: 	 handle_info/2, code_change/3, terminate/2, format_status/2]).
   83: 
   84: %% This module needs to compile on old nodes...
   85: -ifndef(CT_PEER).
   86: -define(CT_PEER(), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   87: -define(CT_PEER(Opts), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   88: -endif.
   89: -ifndef(CT_PEER_REL).
   90: -define(CT_PEER_REL(Opts, Release, PrivDir), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   91: -endif.
   92: 
   93: suite() ->
   94:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   95:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   96: 
   97: all() -> 
   98:     [start, start_event_timeout, start_event_timeout_zero,
   99:      {group,stop}, crash, loop_start_fail, call, send_request,
  100:      send_request_receive_reqid_collection, send_request_wait_reqid_collection,
  101:      send_request_check_reqid_collection, cast, cast_fast, info, abcast,
  102:      continue, handle_event_timeout,
  103:      handle_event_timeout_infinity,
  104:      handle_event_timeout_zero,
  105:      handle_event_timeout_plain,
  106:      {group, multi_call},
  107:      call_remote1, call_remote2, calling_self,
  108:      call_remote3, call_remote_n1, call_remote_n2,
  109:      call_remote_n3, spec_init,
  110:      spec_init_local_registered_parent,
  111:      spec_init_global_registered_parent, otp_5854, hibernate, auto_hibernate,
  112:      otp_7669,
  113:      {group, format_status},
  114:      get_state, replace_state,
  115:      call_with_huge_message_queue, {group, undef_callbacks},
  116:      undef_in_terminate, undef_in_handle_info,
  117:      format_log_1, format_log_2, format_log_with_process_label,
  118:      reply_by_alias_with_payload].
  119: 
  120: groups() -> 
  121:     [{stop, [],
  122:       [stop1, stop2, stop3, stop4, stop5, stop6, stop7, stop8, stop9, stop10]},
  123:      {multi_call, [], [{group, multi_call_parallel}, {group, multi_call_sequence}]},
  124:      {multi_call_parallel, [parallel],
  125:       [multicall, multicall_down, multicall_remote, multicall_remote_old1,
  126:        multicall_remote_old2]},
  127:      {multi_call_sequence, [],
  128:       [multicall_recv_opt_success, multicall_recv_opt_timeout,
  129:        multicall_recv_opt_noconnection]},
  130:      {format_status, [],
  131:       [call_format_status, error_format_status, terminate_crash_format,
  132:        crash_in_format_status, throw_in_format_status, format_all_status]},
  133:      {undef_callbacks, [],
  134:       [undef_handle_call, undef_handle_cast, undef_handle_info, undef_handle_continue,
  135:        undef_init, undef_code_change, undef_terminate1, undef_terminate2]}].
  136: 
  137: 
  138: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  139:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  140:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "format_status_server.erl"),
  141:     {ok, format_status_server} = compile:file(Server),
  142:     Config.
  143: 
  144: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  145:     ok.
  146: 
  147: init_per_group(undef_callbacks, Config) ->
  148:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  149:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "oc_server.erl"),
  150:     {ok, oc_server} = compile:file(Server),
  151:     Config;
  152: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  153:     Config.
  154: 
  155: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  156:     Config.
  157: 
  158: 
  159: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == call_remote1;
  160: 				     Case == call_remote2;
  161: 				     Case == call_remote3;
  162: 				     Case == call_remote_n1;
  163: 				     Case == call_remote_n2;
  164: 				     Case == call_remote_n3;
  165:                                      Case == send_request ->
  166:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  167:     ok = global:sync(),
  168:     [{node,Node}, {peer, Peer} | Config];
  169: 
  170: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  171:     Config.
  172: 
  173: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  174:     case proplists:get_value(peer, Config) of
  175: 	undefined ->
  176: 	    ok;
  177: 	Peer ->
  178: 	    try peer:stop(Peer)
  179:             catch exit : noproc ->
  180:                     ok
  181:             end
  182:     end,
  183:     ok.
  184: 
  185: 
  186: %% --------------------------------------
  187: %% Start and stop a gen_server.
  188: %% --------------------------------------
  189: 
  190: start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  191:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  192: 
  193:     %% anonymous
  194:     io:format("anonymous~n", []),
  195:     {ok, Pid0} = ?GEN_SERVER:start(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  196:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid0, started_p),
  197:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid0, stop),
  198:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid0,600),
  199:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid0, started_p, 1)),
  200: 
  201:     %% anonymous with timeout
  202:     io:format("try init timeout~n", []),
  203:     {ok, Pid00} = ?GEN_SERVER:start(gen_server_SUITE, [],
  204: 				   [{timeout,1000}]),
  205:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid00, started_p),
  206:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid00, stop),
  207:     {error, timeout} = ?GEN_SERVER:start(gen_server_SUITE, sleep,
  208: 					[{timeout,100}]),
  209: 
  210:     %% anonymous with ignore
  211:     io:format("try init ignore~n", []),
  212:     ignore = ?GEN_SERVER:start(gen_server_SUITE, ignore, []),
  213: 
  214:     %% anonymous with shutdown
  215:     io:format("try init shutdown~n", []),
  216:     {error, foobar} =
  217:         ?GEN_SERVER:start(gen_server_SUITE, {error, foobar}, []),
  218: 
  219:     %% anonymous with stop
  220:     io:format("try init stop~n", []),
  221:     {error, stopped} = ?GEN_SERVER:start(gen_server_SUITE, stop, []),
  222: 
  223:     %% anonymous linked
  224:     {ok, Pid1} =
  225: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  226:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid1, started_p),
  227:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid1, stop),
  228:     receive
  229: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
  230: 	    ok
  231:     after 5000 ->
  232: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  233:     end,
  234: 
  235:     %% anonymous monitored
  236:     {ok, {Pid1b, Mon1b}} =
  237: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_monitor(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  238:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid1b, started_p),
  239:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid1b, stop),
  240:     receive
  241: 	{'DOWN', Mon1b, process, Pid1b, stopped} ->
  242: 	    ok
  243:     after 5000 ->
  244: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  245:     end,
  246: 
  247:     %% local register
  248:     {ok, Pid2} =
  249: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({local, my_test_name},
  250: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  251:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  252:     {error, {already_started, Pid2}} =
  253: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({local, my_test_name},
  254: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  255:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, stop),
  256: 
  257:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid2,600),
  258: 
  259:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid2, started_p, 10)),
  260: 
  261:     %% local register linked
  262:     {ok, Pid3} =
  263: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  264: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  265:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  266:     {error, {already_started, Pid3}} =
  267: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({local, my_test_name},
  268: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  269:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, stop),
  270:     receive
  271: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
  272: 	    ok
  273:     after 5000 ->
  274: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  275:     end,
  276: 
  277:     %% local register monitored
  278:     {ok, {Pid3b, Mon3b}} =
  279: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  280:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  281:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  282:     {error, {already_started, Pid3b}} =
  283: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  284:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  285:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, stop),
  286:     receive
  287: 	{'DOWN', Mon3b, process, Pid3b, stopped} ->
  288: 	    ok
  289:     after 5000 ->
  290: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  291:     end,
  292: 
  293:     %% global register
  294:     {ok, Pid4} =
  295: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({global, my_test_name},
  296: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  297:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  298:     {error, {already_started, Pid4}} =
  299: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({global, my_test_name},
  300: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  301:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  302:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid4,600),
  303:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid4, started_p, 10)),
  304: 
  305:     %% global register linked
  306:     {ok, Pid5} =
  307: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_link({global, my_test_name},
  308: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  309:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  310:     {error, {already_started, Pid5}} =
  311: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({global, my_test_name},
  312: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  313:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  314:     receive
  315: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, stopped} ->
  316: 	    ok
  317:     after 5000 ->
  318: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  319:     end,
  320: 
  321:     %% global register monitored
  322:     {ok, {Pid5b, Mon5b}} =
  323: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  324:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  325:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  326:     {error, {already_started, Pid5b}} =
  327: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  328:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  329:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  330:     receive
  331: 	{'DOWN', Mon5b, process, Pid5b, stopped} ->
  332: 	    ok
  333:     after 5000 ->
  334: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  335:     end,
  336: 
  337:     %% via register
  338:     dummy_via:reset(),
  339:     {ok, Pid6} =
  340: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  341: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  342:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  343:     {error, {already_started, Pid6}} =
  344: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  345: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  346:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  347:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid6,600),
  348:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid6, started_p, 10)),
  349: 
  350:     %% via register linked
  351:     dummy_via:reset(),
  352:     {ok, Pid7} =
  353: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_link({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  354: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  355:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  356:     {error, {already_started, Pid7}} =
  357: 	?GEN_SERVER:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  358: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  359:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  360:     receive
  361: 	{'EXIT', Pid7, stopped} ->
  362: 	    ok
  363:     after 5000 ->
  364: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  365:     end,
  366:     receive
  367: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,Msg})
  368:     after 1 -> ok
  369:     end,
  370: 
  371:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  372:     ok.
  373: 
  374: start_event_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  375:     throw({skipped, "OTP-28 specific test, not run on OTP-27"}),
  376:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  377: 
  378:     lists:foreach(
  379: 	fun({StartFun, Arg, Interrupt}) ->
  380: 	    {ok, Pid} = StartFun(Arg),
  381: 	    sys:get_status(Pid),
  382: 	    case element(1, Arg) of
  383: 		timeout ->
  384: 		    is_not_hibernated(Pid);
  385: 		continue_timeout ->
  386: 		    is_not_hibernated(Pid);
  387: 		hibernate ->
  388: 		    is_hibernated(Pid);
  389: 		continue_hibernate ->
  390: 		    is_hibernated(Pid)
  391: 	    end,
  392: 	    case Interrupt of
  393: 		true ->
  394: 		    pong = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid, ping);
  395: 		false ->
  396: 		    ok
  397: 	    end,
  398: 	    receive
  399: 		{Pid, event_timeout} ->
  400: 		    not Interrupt orelse ct:fail(event_timeout_message_received)
  401: 	    after 1000 ->
  402: 		Interrupt orelse ct:fail(event_timeout_message_not_received)
  403: 	    end,
  404: 	    is_not_hibernated(Pid),
  405: 	    ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid, stop),
  406: 	    receive
  407: 		{'EXIT', Pid, _} ->
  408: 		    ok
  409: 	    after 5000 ->
  410: 		ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
  411: 	    end
  412: 	end,
  413: 	[{StartFun, Arg, Interrupt} || StartFun <- [fun(X) -> start_link(spec_init_action, [[], X]) end,
  414: 						    fun(X) -> ?GEN_SERVER:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, X, []) end],
  415: 				       Arg <- [{timeout, 500, self()},
  416: 					       {timeout, 500, self(), relative},
  417: 					       {timeout, 500, self(), absolute},
  418: 					       {continue_timeout, 500, self()},
  419: 					       {continue_timeout, 500, self(), relative},
  420: 					       {continue_timeout, 500, self(), absolute},
  421: 					       {hibernate, 500, self()},
  422: 					       {hibernate, 500, self(), relative},
  423: 					       {hibernate, 500, self(), absolute},
  424: 					       {continue_hibernate, 500, self()},
  425: 					       {continue_hibernate, 500, self(), relative},
  426: 					       {continue_hibernate, 500, self(), absolute}],
  427: 				       Interrupt <- [false, true]]),
  428: 
  429:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  430:     ok.
  431: 
  432: start_event_timeout_zero(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  433:     throw({skipped, "OTP-28 specific test, not run on OTP-27"}),
  434:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  435: 
  436:     lists:foreach(
  437: 	fun({StartFun, Arg}) ->
  438: 	    {ok, Pid} = StartFun(Arg),
  439: 	    receive
  440: 		{Pid, after_event_timeout_zero} ->
  441: 		    ct:fail(after_event_timeout_zero_message_received);
  442: 		{Pid, event_timeout} ->
  443: 		    ok
  444: 	    after 1000 ->
  445: 		ct:fail(event_timeout_message_not_received)
  446: 	    end,
  447: 	    receive
  448: 		{Pid, after_event_timeout_zero} ->
  449: 		    ok
  450: 	    after 1000 ->
  451: 		ct:fail(after_event_timeout_zero_message_not_received)
  452: 	    end,
  453: 	    is_not_hibernated(Pid),
  454: 	    ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid, stop),
  455: 	    receive
  456: 		{'EXIT', Pid, _} ->
  457: 		    ok
  458: 	    after 5000 ->
  459: 		ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
  460: 	    end
  461: 	end,
  462: 	[{StartFun, Arg} || StartFun <- [fun(X) -> start_link(spec_init_action, [[], X]) end,
  463: 					 fun(X) -> ?GEN_SERVER:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, X, []) end],
  464: 			    Arg <- [{timeout_zero, self()},
  465: 				    {continue_timeout_zero, self()},
  466: 				    {hibernate_zero, self()},
  467: 				    {continue_hibernate_zero, self()}]]),
  468: 
  469:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  470:     ok.
  471: 
  472: %% Anonymous, reason 'normal'
  473: stop1(_Config) ->
  474:     {ok, Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  475:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop(Pid),
  476:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  477:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop(Pid)),
  478:     ok.
  479: 
  480: %% Anonymous, other reason
  481: stop2(_Config) ->
  482:     {ok,Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  483:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop(Pid, other_reason, infinity),
  484:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  485:     ok.
  486: 
  487: %% Anonymous, invalid timeout
  488: stop3(_Config) ->
  489:     {ok,Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  490:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop(Pid, other_reason, invalid_timeout)),
  491:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  492:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop(Pid),
  493:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  494:     ok.
  495: 
  496: %% Registered name
  497: stop4(_Config) ->
  498:     {ok,Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  499:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop(to_stop),
  500:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  501:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop(to_stop)),
  502:     ok.
  503: 
  504: %% Registered name and local node
  505: stop5(_Config) ->
  506:     {ok,Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  507:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop({to_stop,node()}),
  508:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  509:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop({to_stop,node()})),
  510:     ok.
  511: 
  512: %% Globally registered name
  513: stop6(_Config) ->
  514:     {ok, Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start({global, to_stop}, ?MODULE, [], []),
  515:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop({global,to_stop}),
  516:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  517:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop({global,to_stop})),
  518:     ok.
  519: 
  520: %% 'via' registered name
  521: stop7(_Config) ->
  522:     dummy_via:reset(),
  523:     {ok, Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start({via, dummy_via, to_stop},
  524: 				 ?MODULE, [], []),
  525:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop}),
  526:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  527:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop})),
  528:     ok.
  529: 
  530: %% Anonymous on remote node
  531: stop8(_Config) ->
  532:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  533:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  534:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  535:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[?MODULE,[],[]]),
  536:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop(Pid),
  537:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  538:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop(Pid)),
  539:     peer:stop(Peer),
  540:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop(Pid)),
  541:     ok.
  542: 
  543: %% Registered name on remote node
  544: stop9(_Config) ->
  545:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  546:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  547:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  548:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[{local,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  549:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop({to_stop,Node}),
  550:     undefined = rpc:call(Node,erlang,whereis,[to_stop]),
  551:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  552:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  553:     peer:stop(Peer),
  554:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  555:     ok.
  556: 
  557: %% Globally registered name on remote node
  558: stop10(_Config) ->
  559:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  560:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  561:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  562:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[{global,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  563:     ok = global:sync(),
  564:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:stop({global,to_stop}),
  565:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  566:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop({global,to_stop})),
  567:     peer:stop(Peer),
  568:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:stop({global,to_stop})),
  569:     ok.
  570: 
  571: crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  572:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
  573: 
  574:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  575: 
  576:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  577:     {ok,Pid0} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  578:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,reason},_}} =
  579:  	(catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid0, shutdown_reason)),
  580:     receive {'EXIT',Pid0,{shutdown,reason}} -> ok end,
  581: 
  582:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  583:     {ok,Pid1} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state1}, []),
  584:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,stop_reason},_}} =
  585: 	(catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid1, stop_shutdown_reason)),
  586:     receive {'EXIT',Pid1,{shutdown,stop_reason}} -> ok end,
  587: 
  588:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  589:     {ok,Pid2} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  590:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  591:  	(catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid2, exit_shutdown)),
  592:     receive {'EXIT',Pid2,shutdown} -> ok end,
  593: 
  594:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  595:     {ok,Pid3} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state3}, []),
  596:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  597: 	(catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid3, stop_shutdown)),
  598:     receive {'EXIT',Pid3,shutdown} -> ok end,
  599: 
  600:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  601: 
  602:     %% This crash should generate a crash report and a report
  603:     %% from gen_server.
  604:     {ok,Pid4} = ?GEN_SERVER:start(?MODULE, {state,state4}, []),
  605:     {'EXIT',{crashed,_}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid4, crash)),
  606:     receive {error_report,_,_} ->
  607: 	    ok;
  608: 	Other4a ->
  609: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4a]),
  610: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  611:     after 1000 -> 
  612:         ok
  613:     end,
  614:     receive {error_report,_,{Pid4,crash_report,[List4|_]}} ->
  615: 	    {exit,crashed,[{?MODULE, handle_call, 3, _}|_]} = proplists:get_value(error_info, List4),
  616: 	    Pid4 = proplists:get_value(pid, List4);
  617: 	Other4 ->
  618: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4]),
  619: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  620:     after 1000 -> 
  621:         ok
  622:     end,
  623: 
  624:     receive
  625: 	Any ->
  626: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Any]),
  627: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  628:     after 500 ->
  629: 	    ok
  630:     end,
  631: 
  632:     ok.
  633: 
  634: 
  635: loop_start_fail(Config) ->
  636:     _ = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  637:     loop_start_fail(
  638:       Config,
  639:       [{start, []}, {start, [link]},
  640:        {start_link, []},
  641:        {start_monitor, [link]}, {start_monitor, []}]).
  642: 
  643: loop_start_fail(_Config, []) ->
  644:     ok;
  645: loop_start_fail(Config, [{Start, Opts} | Start_Opts]) ->
  646:     loop_start_fail(
  647:       fun ?GEN_SERVER:Start/3,
  648:       {ets, {return, {stop, failed_to_start}}}, Opts,
  649:       fun ({error, failed_to_start}) -> ok end),
  650:     loop_start_fail(
  651:       fun ?GEN_SERVER:Start/3,
  652:       {ets, {return, ignore}}, Opts,
  653:       fun (ignore) -> ok end),
  654:     loop_start_fail(
  655:       fun ?GEN_SERVER:Start/3,
  656:       {ets, {return, 4711}}, Opts,
  657:       fun ({error, {bad_return_value, 4711}}) -> ok end),
  658:     loop_start_fail(
  659:       fun ?GEN_SERVER:Start/3,
  660:       {ets, {crash, error, bailout}}, Opts,
  661:       fun ({error, {bailout, ST}}) when is_list(ST) -> ok end),
  662:     loop_start_fail(
  663:       fun ?GEN_SERVER:Start/3,
  664:       {ets, {crash, exit, bailout}}, Opts,
  665:       fun ({error, bailout}) -> ok end),
  666:     loop_start_fail(
  667:       fun ?GEN_SERVER:Start/3,
  668:       {ets, {wait, 1000, void}}, [{timeout, 200} | Opts],
  669:       fun ({error, timeout}) -> ok end),
  670:     loop_start_fail(Config, Start_Opts).
  671: 
  672: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun) ->
  673:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, 5).
  674: %%
  675: loop_start_fail(_GenStartFun, _Arg, _Opts, _ValidateFun, 0) ->
  676:     ok;
  677: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N) ->
  678:     ok = ValidateFun(GenStartFun(?MODULE, Arg, Opts)),
  679:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N - 1).
  680: 
  681: 
  682: 
  683: %% --------------------------------------
  684: %% Test ?GEN_SERVER:call and handle_call.
  685: %% Test all different return values from
  686: %% handle_call.
  687: %% --------------------------------------
  688: 
  689: call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  690:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  691: 
  692:     {ok, _Pid} =
  693: 	?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  694: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  695: 
  696:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  697:     delayed = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
  698: 
  699:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  700:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  701:     timer:sleep(500),
  702:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  703:     ok = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  704:     timer:sleep(1500),
  705:     false = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  706: 
  707:     %% timeout call.
  708:     delayed = ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}, 30),
  709:     {'EXIT',{timeout,_}} =
  710: 	(catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,30}, 1)),
  711: 
  712:     %% bad return value in the gen_server loop from handle_call.
  713:     {'EXIT',{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} =
  714: 	(catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(my_test_name, badreturn)),
  715: 
  716:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  717:     ok.
  718: 
  719: %% --------------------------------------
  720: %% Test ?GEN_SERVER:send_request.
  721: %% --------------------------------------
  722: 
  723: send_request(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  724:     throw({skipped, "Not implemented"}),
  725:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  726: 
  727:     {ok, Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  728:                                       gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  729: 
  730:     Async = fun(Process, Req) ->
  731:                     try
  732:                         Promise = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Process, Req),
  733:                         ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(Promise, infinity)
  734:                     catch _:Reason:ST ->
  735:                             {'did_exit', Reason, ST}
  736:                     end
  737:             end,
  738:     {reply,ok} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  739: 
  740:     {reply,delayed} = Async(Pid, {delayed_answer,1}),
  741: 
  742:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  743:     Promise1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  744:     Promise2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(my_test_name, next_call),
  745:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(Promise1, infinity),
  746:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(Promise2, infinity),
  747: 
  748:     Promise3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  749:     no_reply = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response({foo, bar}, Promise3),
  750:     receive {[alias|Ref],_} = Msg when is_reference(Ref) ->
  751:             {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(Msg, Promise3)
  752:     after 1000 ->
  753:             %% Format changed which is ok. This test is just to make you
  754:             %% aware that you have changed it
  755:             exit(message_format_changed)
  756:     end,
  757:     timer:sleep(1500),
  758: 
  759:     {reply, false} = Async(my_test_name, next_call),
  760: 
  761:     %% timeout
  762:     Promise5 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,50}),
  763:     timeout = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(Promise5, 0),
  764:     {reply, delayed} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(Promise5, infinity),
  765: 
  766:     %% bad return value in the gen_server loop from handle_call.
  767:     {error,{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} = Async(my_test_name, badreturn),
  768: 
  769:     %% Test other error cases
  770:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(Pid, started_p),
  771:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  772:     {error, {noconnection, _}} = Async({my_test_name, foo@node}, started_p),
  773: 
  774:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async({global, non_existing}, started_p),
  775:     catch exit(whereis(dummy_via), foo),
  776:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} =
  777:         (catch ?GEN_SERVER:send_request({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p)),
  778: 
  779:     %% Remote nodes
  780:     Via = dummy_via:reset(),
  781:     Remote = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
  782:     {ok, RPid} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server, start, [{global, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  783:     dummy_via:register_name(remote, RPid),
  784:     {reply, ok} = Async(RPid, started_p),
  785:     {reply, ok} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  786:     {reply, ok} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  787:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({global, remote}, stop_shutdown),
  788:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  789:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  790:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p),
  791: 
  792:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server, start, [{local, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  793:     {reply, ok} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  794:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, stop_shutdown),
  795:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  796: 
  797:     %% Cleanup
  798:     catch exit(Via, foo2),
  799:     receive {'EXIT', Via, foo2} -> ok end,
  800:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  801:     ok.
  802: 
  803: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  804:     throw({skipped, "Not implemented"}),
  805:     {ok, Pid1} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  806:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  807:     {ok, Pid2} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  808:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  809:     {ok, Pid3} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  810:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  811:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  812:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  813:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  814:     unlink(Pid1),
  815:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  816:     unlink(Pid2),
  817:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  818:     unlink(Pid3),
  819:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  820:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  821:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  822:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  823:     ok.
  824: 
  825: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  826: 
  827:     ReqId0 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  828: 
  829:     ReqIdC0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_new(),
  830: 
  831:     ReqId1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  832:     ReqIdC1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  833:     1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  834: 
  835:     ReqIdC2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  836:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  837: 
  838:     ReqIdC3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  839:     3 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  840:     
  841:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  842:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  843: 
  844:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  845:     1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  846: 
  847:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  848:     0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  849: 
  850:     no_request = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  851: 
  852:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  853: 
  854:     ok.
  855: 
  856: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  857: 
  858:     ReqId0 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  859: 
  860:     ReqIdC0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_new(),
  861: 
  862:     ReqId1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  863:     ReqIdC1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  864: 
  865:     ReqIdC2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  866: 
  867:     ReqId3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  868:     ReqIdC3 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  869: 
  870:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  871:     
  872:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  873:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  874: 
  875:     timeout = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  876: 
  877:     Abandoned = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  878:     Abandoned = lists:sort(?GEN_SERVER:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  879: 
  880:     %% Make sure requests were abandoned...
  881:     timeout = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1000}, true),
  882: 
  883:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  884: 
  885:     ok.
  886:     
  887: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  888: 
  889:     ReqId0 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  890: 
  891:     ReqIdC0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_new(),
  892: 
  893:     ReqId1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  894:     ReqIdC1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  895:     try
  896:         nope = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
  897:     catch
  898:         error:badarg -> ok
  899:     end,
  900:  
  901:     unlink(Pid2),
  902:     ReqIdC2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  903:     ReqIdC3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  904:     3 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  905:     
  906:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
  907:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  908: 
  909:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  910: 
  911:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  912: 
  913:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  914: 
  915:     ok.
  916: 
  917: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  918:     throw({skipped, "Not implemented"}),
  919:     {ok, Pid1} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  920:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  921:     {ok, Pid2} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  922:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  923:     {ok, Pid3} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  924:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  925:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  926:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  927:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  928:     unlink(Pid1),
  929:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  930:     unlink(Pid2),
  931:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  932:     unlink(Pid3),
  933:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  934:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  935:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  936:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  937:     ok.
  938: 
  939: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  940: 
  941:     ReqId0 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  942: 
  943:     ReqIdC0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_new(),
  944: 
  945:     ReqId1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  946:     ReqIdC1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  947:     1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  948: 
  949:     ReqIdC2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  950:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  951: 
  952:     ReqIdC3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  953:     3 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  954:     
  955:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  956:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  957: 
  958:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  959:     1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  960: 
  961:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  962:     0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  963: 
  964:     no_request = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  965: 
  966:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  967: 
  968:     ok.
  969: 
  970: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  971: 
  972:     ReqId0 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  973: 
  974:     ReqIdC0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_new(),
  975: 
  976:     ReqId1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  977:     ReqIdC1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  978: 
  979:     ReqIdC2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  980: 
  981:     ReqId3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  982:     ReqIdC3 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  983: 
  984:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  985:     
  986:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  987:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  988: 
  989:     timeout = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  990: 
  991:     Unhandled = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  992:     Unhandled = lists:sort(?GEN_SERVER:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  993: 
  994:     %% Make sure requests were not abandoned...
  995:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  996:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  997: 
  998:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  999: 
 1000:     ok.
 1001:     
 1002: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
 1003: 
 1004:     ReqId0 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
 1005: 
 1006:     ReqIdC0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_new(),
 1007: 
 1008:     ReqId1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
 1009:     ReqIdC1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1010:     try
 1011:         nope = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
 1012:     catch
 1013:         error:badarg -> ok
 1014:     end,
 1015:  
 1016:     unlink(Pid2),
 1017:     ReqIdC2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1018:     ReqIdC3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1019:     3 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1020:     
 1021:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
 1022:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1023: 
 1024:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
 1025: 
 1026:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
 1027: 
 1028:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
 1029: 
 1030:     ok.
 1031: 
 1032: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1033:     throw({skipped, "Not implemented"}),
 1034:     {ok, Pid1} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
 1035:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1036:     {ok, Pid2} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
 1037:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1038:     {ok, Pid3} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
 1039:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1040:     send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
 1041:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
 1042:     unlink(Pid1),
 1043:     exit(Pid1, kill),
 1044:     unlink(Pid2),
 1045:     exit(Pid2, kill),
 1046:     unlink(Pid3),
 1047:     exit(Pid3, kill),
 1048:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
 1049:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
 1050:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
 1051:     ok.
 1052: 
 1053: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
 1054: 
 1055:     ReqId0 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
 1056: 
 1057:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1058: 
 1059:     ReqIdC0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_new(),
 1060: 
 1061:     ReqIdC1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1062:     1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
 1063: 
 1064:     ReqId2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1065:     ReqIdC2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId2, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1066:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
 1067: 
 1068:     ReqIdC3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1069:     3 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1070: 
 1071:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
 1072:     no_reply = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
 1073:     
 1074:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
 1075:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1076: 
 1077:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, true),
 1078:     1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1079: 
 1080:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true),
 1081:     0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1082: 
 1083:     no_request = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC6, true),
 1084: 
 1085:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1086: 
 1087:     ok.
 1088:     
 1089: send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
 1090: 
 1091:     ReqId0 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
 1092: 
 1093:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1094: 
 1095:     ReqIdC0 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_new(),
 1096: 
 1097:     ReqId1 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
 1098:     ReqIdC1 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1099: 
 1100:     unlink(Pid2),
 1101:     ReqIdC2 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1102: 
 1103:     ReqIdC3 = ?GEN_SERVER:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1104:     3 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1105: 
 1106:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
 1107: 
 1108:     no_reply = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
 1109:     
 1110:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
 1111:     2 = ?GEN_SERVER:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1112: 
 1113:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
 1114: 
 1115:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
 1116: 
 1117:     {reply, ok} = ?GEN_SERVER:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1118: 
 1119:     ok.
 1120: 
 1121: next_msg() ->
 1122:     receive M -> M end.
 1123: 
 1124: %% --------------------------------------
 1125: %% Test handle_continue.
 1126: %% --------------------------------------
 1127: 
 1128: continue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1129:     {ok, Pid} = ?GEN_SERVER:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, {continue, self()}, []),
 1130:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1131: 
 1132:     ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid, {continue_reply, self()}),
 1133:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1134: 
 1135:     ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
 1136:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1137: 
 1138:     ?GEN_SERVER:cast(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
 1139:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1140: 
 1141:     Pid ! {continue_noreply, self()},
 1142:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1143: 
 1144:     Pid ! {continue_continue, self()},
 1145:     [{Pid, before_continue}, {Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1146: 
 1147:     Ref = monitor(process, Pid),
 1148:     Pid ! continue_stop,
 1149:     verify_down_reason(Ref, Pid, normal).
 1150: 
 1151: read_replies(Pid) ->
 1152:     receive
 1153: 	{Pid, ack} -> read_replies()
 1154:     after
 1155: 	1000 -> ct:fail({continue, ack})
 1156:     end.
 1157: 
 1158: read_replies() ->
 1159:     receive
 1160: 	Msg -> [Msg | read_replies()]
 1161:     after
 1162: 	0 -> []
 1163:     end.
 1164: 
 1165: %% --------------------------------------
 1166: %% Test call to nonexisting processes on remote nodes
 1167: %% --------------------------------------
 1168: 
 1169: call_remote1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1170:     N = hubba,
 1171:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1172:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1173: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1174:     ok = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1175:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1176:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, N},
 1177: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1178:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1179:     ok.
 1180: 
 1181: call_remote2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1182:     N = hubba,
 1183:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1184: 
 1185:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1186: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1187:     ok = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid, started_p, infinity)),
 1188:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1189:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid,
 1190: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1191:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1192:     ok.
 1193: 
 1194: call_remote3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1195:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1196: 
 1197:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1198: 			 [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1199:     ok = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call({piller, Node}, started_p, infinity)),
 1200:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1201:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call({piller, Node},
 1202: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1203:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1204:     ok.
 1205:

 1207: %% Test call to nonexisting node
 1208: %% --------------------------------------

 1210: call_remote_n1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1211:     N = hubba,
 1212:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1213:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1214: 			  [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1215:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1216:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} =
 1217: 	(catch ?GEN_SERVER:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1218: 
 1219:     ok.
 1220: 
 1221: call_remote_n2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1222:     N = hubba,
 1223:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1224: 
 1225:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1226: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1227:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1228:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(Pid,
 1229: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1230: 
 1231:     ok.
 1232:

 1234:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1235:

 1237: 			  [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1238:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1239:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call({piller, Node},
 1240: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1241:

 1250:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch ?GEN_SERVER:call(self(), oops, infinity)),
 1251:     ok.
